tool.name: Genehunter-Modscore
tool.command:
ghm < '$setup_file'
&& linkage2allegro '${inp_ped}' '${inp_map}' genehunter -l gh.out #if $section_haplo.analysis_haplo.extra_haplotype -h haplo.dump #end if
&& mv linkage.allegro_lod '${fparam}' #if $section_haplo.analysis_haplo.extra_haplotype && mv linkage.allegro_haplo '${ihaplo}' #end if

param.name: extra_haplotype_method
param.label: Haplotype Reconstruction Algorithm. MaxProb is fastest, and has more global solution.

param.name: extra_alg_mem
param.label: Remove large memory restrictions for algebraic calculations

param.name: extra_cpv_nor
param.label: Number of replicates in P-value calculations

param.name: extra_modcalc
param.label: Inheritance Vector storage for LOD and P-value calculations

param.name: extra_mod_bep
param.label: Calculate P-values only at the best LOD positions

param.name: extra_seq
param.label: Number of sequential simulations in P-value calculations

param.name: extra_srs
param.label: Set Random seed for P-value calculations

param.name: extra_mod_dimensions
param.label: Number of parameters to vary in LOD calculations

param.name: extra_offend
param.label: Margin before and after marker range to compute scores (cM)

param.name: extra_increment_type
param.label: Increment either the genetic distance across the whole range of markers, or the number of equally-spaced steps between adjacent markers
param.help: Note that the total number of steps (markers * calc. per step) must not exceed 1000.

param.name: extra_maxbits
param.label: Max bit-size of the pedigree, computed via '2N-F', for F founders and N non-founders

param.name: extra_maxbits_skiplarge
param.label: Split pedigrees if larger than the max pedigree size

tool.help:
**Genehunter-MODscore** calculates a *maximized LOD* (MOD) score over a set of genotypes for use in linkage and haplotype analysis.
Haplotypes are generated using either this maximum probability approach, or via slower more conventional Viterbi crawling.
Untyped founders can be simulated by reconstructing their haplotypes from offspring, and points of recombination can still be accurately determined in lieu of this.
Due to the stochastic nature of the analysis, a random seed can be set by the user to produce reproducible results.
Many more configurable options are outlined in the the official manual_.
.. _manual: https://www.helmholtz-muenchen.de/fileadmin/GENEPI/downloads/ghm-3.0.pdf
